page.title: 07BRIGHTWELL-SAND&GRAVEL WORKS
page.content: Sand and gravel has been excavated from a site at Sheep Drift Farm for the last 25 years. The site covers over 90 acres and lies a half mile to the North of Ipswich to Waldringfield Road and just east of the Martlesham Industrial Estate. At present the main workings extend over 45 acres and a further 48 acres of the site have yet to be quarried. Modern plant wash, grade and load the material on site and a fleet of 21 lorries belonging to the firm of Wilding & Smith distribute the product to builders and other customers in the area. Fifty one people are employed in the business. A large lake extends over former workings up to 33 feet deep and this is well stocked with fish.Part of the site has been reclaimed and will revert to farmland later in l985.
